item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 22, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Do you want to be doing this when you're 50? (44 points | 36 comments)
2. Apple pulls data protection tool after UK government security row (1428 points | 924 comments)
3. Money lessons without money: The financial literacy fallacy (128 points | 105 comments)
4. Twitch limiting uploads to 100 hours, deleting the rest starting April 19th (39 points | 24 comments)
5. Binned staff, slashed stock options. What's next? Ah yes, bigger C-suite bonuses (80 points | 8 comments)
6. These years in Common Lisp: 2023-2024 in review (51 points | 3 comments)
7. Augurs demo (117 points | 6 comments)
8. Why Ruby on Rails still matters (384 points | 332 comments)
9. Richard Feynman's blackboard at the time of his death (1988) (391 points | 206 comments)
10. A vending machine, on the internet (134 points | 46 comments)
11. Johnny.Decimal – A system to organise your life (459 points | 236 comments)
12. Bybit loses $1.5B in hack but can cover loss, CEO confirms (230 points | 228 comments)
13. DigiKey's Tariff Resources (58 points | 25 comments)
14. Surface-Stable Fractal Dither on Playdate (101 points | 17 comments)
15. Reality has a surprising amount of detail (2017) (324 points | 166 comments)
16. DeepDive in everything of Llama3: revealing detailed insights and implementation (179 points | 9 comments)
17. The Ren'Py Visual Novel Engine (185 points | 79 comments)
18. Sparse Voxels Rasterization: Real-Time High-Fidelity Radiance Field Rendering (93 points | 18 comments)
19. Where are all the Rewrite Rules? (42 points | 18 comments)
20. Yocto, RockPi and SBOMs: Building modern embedded Linux images (131 points | 85 comments)
21. Launch HN: Massdriver (YC W22) – Self-serve cloud infra without the red tape (64 points | 51 comments)
22. Show HN: Slime OS – An open-source app launcher for RP2040 based devices (119 points | 4 comments)
23. Nanotini – smallest pasta makes a good bandage (3 points | discuss)
24. I found a backdoor into my bed (818 points | 328 comments)
25. Ancient switch to soft food gave us overbite–the ability to pronounce 'f's,'v' (154 points | 106 comments)
26. Can you lose your native tongue? (2024) (81 points | 141 comments)
27. Fly To Podman: a script that will help you to migrate from Docker (199 points | 111 comments)
28. SVDQuant+NVFP4: 4× Smaller, 3× Faster FLUX with 16-bit Quality on Blackwell GPUs (46 points | 8 comments)
29. Suckless.org: software that sucks less (299 points | 183 comments)
30. 20 years working on the same software product (415 points | 142 comments)
